    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Account​(java.lang.String owner, int account, double initial)
      Sets up the account by defining its owner, account number, and initial balance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double addInterest()
      Adds interest to the account and returns the new balance.
      double deposit​(double amount)
      Validates the transaction, then deposits the specified amount into the account.
      double getAccountNumber()
      Returns the account number.
      double getBalance()
      Returns the current balance of the account.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a one-line description of the account as a string.
      void transfer​(Account other)
      Asks the user for amount to transfer from one account to another.
      double withdraw​(double amount, double fee)
      Validates the transaction, then withdraws the specified amount from the account.
